not available
symptomatic
• subependymal nodules at the foramen of monro on both sides, calcified on ct and enhancing on mr, 
• cortical tubers, multiple, in both cerebral hemispheres.
tuberous sclerosis
• tuberous sclerosis
• bourneville disease
• chromosome 9 or 16 mutation
22 month old boy with developmental delay and seizures.
